statements: SELECT * FROM threat_intelligence_feeds LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, feed_source, indicator_type, indicator_value, timestamp FROM threat_intelligence_feeds WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM threat_intelligence_feeds WHERE indicator_type = 'malware' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT feed_source, indicator_value FROM threat_intelligence_feeds WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01';
SELECT id, indicator_type FROM threat_intelligence_feeds WHERE indicator_value LIKE '%ransomware%';
SELECT feed_source, indicator_value FROM threat_intelligence_feeds WHERE indicator_type = 'IP' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM threat_intelligence_feeds WHERE indicator_type = 'Domain' AND feed_source = 'FireEye' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT indicator_type, count(*) as count FROM threat_intelligence_feeds GROUP BY indicator_type HAVING count > 5 ORDER BY count DESC
SELECT DISTINCT feed_source FROM threat_intelligence_feeds WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY feed_source
SELECT * FROM threat_intelligence_feeds WHERE indicator_type IN ('IP', 'Domain') ORDER BY feed_source ASC, timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM threat_intelligence_feeds WHERE id = 1;
SELECT feed_name, feed_description FROM threat_intelligence_feeds WHERE feed_name LIKE '%malware%';
SELECT feed_url FROM threat_intelligence_feeds ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_analytics WHERE threat_level > 5;
SELECT event_id, timestamp, source_ip FROM security_analytics WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM threat_intelligence_feeds WHERE feed_name = 'Malware Feeds';
SELECT feed_name, feed_description FROM threat_intelligence_feeds WHERE feed_name LIKE 'Threat%';
SELECT feed_name, feed_url FROM threat_intelligence_feeds WHERE feed_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY feed_name ASC;
SELECT feed_name, feed_url, feed_description FROM threat_intelligence_feeds WHERE feed_description LIKE '%exploit%' AND feed_url LIKE '%http%';
SELECT feed_name, feed_url FROM threat_intelligence_feeds WHERE feed_description IS NOT NULL AND id < 10 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ThreatIntelligenceFeeds;
SELECT feed_name, feed_description FROM ThreatIntelligenceFeeds WHERE feed_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT feed_source FROM ThreatIntelligenceFeeds WHERE feed_name LIKE 'Malware%';
SELECT feed_id, feed_name FROM ThreatIntelligenceFeeds ORDER BY feed_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Indicators JOIN ThreatIntelligenceFeeds ON Indicators.feed_id = ThreatIntelligenceFeeds.feed_id;
SELECT * FROM ThreatIntelligenceFeeds;
SELECT feed_name, feed_description FROM ThreatIntelligenceFeeds WHERE feed_source='External';
SELECT feed_name, COUNT(indicator_id) AS total_indicators FROM ThreatIntelligenceFeeds JOIN Indicators ON ThreatIntelligenceFeeds.feed_id = Indicators.feed_id GROUP BY feed_name;
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM SecurityAnalytics WHERE event_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT feed_name, indicator_type, indicator_value FROM ThreatIntelligenceFeeds JOIN Indicators ON ThreatIntelligenceFeeds.feed_id = Indicators.feed_id ORDER BY feed_name ASC, indicator_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM threat_feeds;
SELECT feed_name, last_updated FROM threat_feeds ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT indicator_value FROM indicators WHERE indicator_type = 'IP';
SELECT * FROM malware WHERE detection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY detection_date DESC;
SELECT incident_name, incident_date FROM incidents WHERE malware_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM threat_feeds WHERE feed_id = 1;
SELECT feed_name, feed_id FROM threat_feeds ORDER BY feed_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM indicators JOIN threat_feeds ON indicators.feed_id = threat_feeds.feed_id WHERE indicator_type = 'IP';
SELECT * FROM malware WHERE detection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT incident_name, incident_date FROM incidents JOIN malware ON incidents.malware_id = malware.malware_id WHERE malware_name LIKE '%ransomware%';
SELECT * FROM threat_intel_feed;
SELECT feed_name, feed_url FROM threat_intel_feed WHERE id = 1;
SELECT last_updated, feed_name FROM threat_intel_feed ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM threat_indicators WHERE indicator_type = 'Malware' AND related_feed_id = 2;
SELECT log_id, log_timestamp, alert_message FROM alert_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM threat_intel_feed;
SELECT feed_name, feed_url FROM threat_intel_feed WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01';
SELECT indicator_type, indicator_value FROM threat_indicators ORDER BY indicator_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'Malware';
SELECT users.username, alert_logs.alert_message FROM users INNER JOIN alert_logs ON users.user_id = alert_logs.related_event_id;
